problem_summary_simple: Can you reach the target before any ghost catches you?
problem_summary_technical: Compare the Manhattan distance from the player to the target with the Manhattan distance from each ghost to the target.
key_insights: The problem relies on the Manhattan distance, as movement is restricted to cardinal directions.
The player escapes if their shortest path to the target is strictly shorter than any ghost's shortest path to the target.
If any ghost can reach the target at the same time or earlier than the player, escape is impossible.
